definitions.definition: Food that is prepared and eaten, usually at a specific time, and usually in a comparatively large quantity (as opposed to a snack).
definitions.example: Breakfast is the morning meal, lunch is the noon meal, and dinner, or supper, is the evening meal.

definitions.definition: Food served or eaten as a repast.
The coarse-ground edible part of various grains often used to feed animals; flour or a coarser blend than flour.
A part; a fragment; a portion.
